casename: Tay Kim Kuan v Public Prosecutor
counsel: Jimmy Yim SC and Suresh Divyanathan (Drew & Napier) for the appellant; Anandan Bala and Thong Chee Kun (Deputy Public Prosecutors) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Sentencing/Carnal connection with underaged girl/Internet sex case/Relevance of English authorities/Difference in social and moral considerations/Whether consent a mitigating factor/Whether sentence manifestly inadequate/Whether need for deterrent sentence/Whether sentence to be enhanced/s 40(1)(i) Women's Charter (Cap 53, 1997 Ed)
